name: Anthony
message: Incredible hospitality and value!

name: Po Mi
message: Costly hostel close to the cycle path and river walk. Hosts were very friendly, and the hostel situated in a very quiet, beautiful countryside!

name: Sung
message: I stayed here for one night during a cycling trip and was particularly impressed by three things:- Accessibility: This is the closest accommodation to the local bike paths, making it extremely convenient for cyclists.- Value for Money: While it's not a 5-star hotel, the value for the price paid was excellent.- Friendly Host: The host was incredibly welcoming, offering recommendations for local eateries (which were amazing) and attractions right upon arrival, and even gave me a lift for some quick shopping. His responsiveness and attentiveness to even small issues made the stay very comfortable.Other international guests seemed to enjoy the beautiful yard and the friendly atmosphere. Itâ€™s a great spot for visitors from abroad. Iâ€™ll definitely revisit if Iâ€™m in the area again. Highly recommended!

name: Paul
message: Shingu is great, supportive and so much helping us to find out the good restaurants and place to visit, coffee, etc.,Iâ€™ll visit him again. Thanks Shingu.

name: Setiaman
message: Host gave extraordinary services. We arrived at mid night. The host waited for us and stayed in the same place overnight to serve us. A surprisingly he offered us dinner and served us by himself. In the morning he extended the service by taking us to local restaurants for breakfast. The breakfast was fantastic and allow us to taste local cuisine. This is really extraordinary service. Thank you very much.

name: Daniel
message: Stayed here for one night on our Seoul to Busan bike ride. We had a wonderful time staying in Yeoju with the host who generously shared their time and showed us around their favorite spots.

name: Sung
message: ë§Œì¡±í–ˆìë‹ˆë‹¤

name: Pablo
message: Everything ok. Garden is really trashy but inside everything is fine. Fridge is a bit filthy with leftovers of previous guest. Overall OK stay if you are on the road to Busan. Host is very friendly and quick in communication.

name: M
message: Several of my colleagues and I stayed at the Go-out Guesthouse for an extended period for work, and the guesthouse met all of our expectations and more. Shinku was a very accommodating host and quick to respond. The guesthouse has all you need for a trip through or long-term stays, including a laundry machine and full kitchen. The Namhan River and cycling trail is just a short walk from the guesthouse. Highly recommended for cyclists passing through or anyone else who happens to be visiting Yeoju!

name: M
message: I stayed at the Go Out Guesthouse with a team of co-workers for a relatively long period of time, so the guesthouse became something of a second homd for us. It is ideal for large groups that don't mind sharing a comm9n living space, and it has all the facilities and amenities necessary for a long stay. Shinku was a very accomodating host and provided us with any help we needed. The location is perfect for access to the bike trail and the Namhan River. The guesthouse also has a nice courtyard and a setup fot barbecues, and the karaoke machine on the first floor is a definite plus. Highly recommend.

name: Keli'I
message: Although it is a little late in the season, I decided to ride my bicycle from Seoul to Busan. Shinku's place was very convenient since it is one of the only two AirBnb's in the area.  It is not too far off of the path so it is a fantastic place to stay at. The hospitality was outstanding!  Yuri, Shinku's friend, took me out to a nearby restaurant to eat some delicious food - even though she was sick!  The place was cleanly, the beds were comfortable, and it had everything you need at an accommodation.  I recommend staying here if you plan to visit ì—¬ì£¼ì‹œì²­ or are on your way to Busan on a bicycle.

name: Aric
message: This place is very unique! I loved staying here. ì—¬ì£¼ is a very nice place to explore. Shinku was not there when I stayed but his dad was very caring and friendly. When I asked if there were good restaurants around, he drove me to one that was open and made sure I didnt have to walk. He was very happy to see me and I will try to stay here again just to say hi to Shinku's dad.

name: Melissa
message:
Un soggiorno davvero piacevole! 
La struttura Ã¨ semplice ma pulita e funzionale, in un'ottima posizione vicino al fiume Han. Shinku Ã¨ stato un ospite gentilissimo e mi ha regalato una serata molto divertente con un barbeque in giardino. Soprattutto, ha avuto la pazienza di ascoltare le mie chiacchiere in un coreano a dir poco scadente! ^^ ê³ ë§ˆì›Œìš”!
